scripts.[run local db]: cv-db: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo $BRANCH | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' ); (docker run -d --name cv-db-01__$BRANCH --restart unless-stopped -e POSTGRES_DB=mucv -e POSTGRES_USER=mucv-su -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD='mucv-Pa$$w0rd' -e PGDATA=/var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata -v "$PWD/temp:/var/lib/postgresql/data" -p 5433:5432 postgres:16-bookworm)
scripts.[build local image]: cv-api: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo $BRANCH | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' ); docker build ./Resume -f Resume/CV/MU.CV.API/Dockerfile.local -t mu/cv-api:local__$BRANCH
scripts.up dev in docker: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo "$BRANCH" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | tr '/' '-'); COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=rs-back__$BRANCH docker-compose -f docker-compose.local.yaml up -d
scripts.down dev from docker: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); BRANCH=$(echo "$BRANCH" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | tr '/' '-'); COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=rs-back__$BRANCH docker-compose -f docker-compose.local.yaml down
